---

‚úÖ KTUI is now wired up.

What changed  
1. Added the official design-tokens (`ktui-vars.css`) and pulled in the KTUI base stylesheet.  
2. Imported those two files at the very top of `src/style.css` so KTUI styles cascade before your own.  
3. Loaded the KTUI runtime (`ktui.min.js`) in `src/main.js` ‚Äì interactive components now work without extra code.  
4. Dropped in the recommended Inter web-font and set `antialiased` on the `<body>` for cleaner text.

Next step  
Run the dev server inside `frontend`:

```bash
cd frontend
npm run dev
```

Then refresh your browser ‚Äì buttons, inputs, alerts, etc. will pick up KTUI‚Äôs default Tailwind-powered look.  
From here you can copy markup snippets from https://ktui.io/docs/components to start using components directly.

Let me know if you‚Äôd like any tweaks or help converting specific elements.
